readingMnemonic: However, the only way to break the <kanji>chain</kanji> is to <reading>saw</reading> (さ) it open. Once the triceratops shellfish start holding on, they never let go. So when you want to take the chain off you have to really hack at it with your saw.
meaningMnemonic: The famous <radical>gold</radical> <radical>triceratops</radical> <radical>shellfish</radical> is good for only one thing, and that's being made into <kanji>chain</kanji>s. They link their triceratops horns together and form an unbreakable gold chain. You can't eat them, because they're gold. So they're only really good for their chaining together ability.
